description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(906).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,602,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (30 +301*x +30*x^2 -x^3)/(1 -602*x^2 +x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013a(n) = 602*a(n-2) - a(n-4) _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[906], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(30 + 301 x + 30 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 602 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[30,301,18090,181201]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 602*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
